text: Adolf Mathis (22 May 1938 - 19 February 2021) was a Swiss alpine skier. He competed at the 1960 Winter Olympics and the 1964 Winter Olympics. He was born in Wolfenschiessen, Switzerland. Mathis died on 19 February 2021, aged 82.Adolf Mathis ist gestorben ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Switzerland Category:Swiss skiers Category:Nidwalden
title: Adolf Mathis
